response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal satisfaction. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this exceptional item at a price that reflects its true worth while allowing me to recover my investment. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This offer represents a fair compromise that respects the value you see in the product while ensuring a profitable transaction for me. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 1200000}
